text: Skyline Whispers is the second studio album by Swedish classic rock/AOR band The Night Flight Orchestra, released on 9 June 2015 via Coroner Records. == Track listing == == Credits == === Personnel === ;The Night Flight Orchestra * Björn "Speed" Strid – vocals * David Andersson – guitar * Sharlee D'Angelo – bass * Richard Larsson – keyboards * Jonas Källsbäck – drums * Sebastian Forslund – congas, percussion, guitar ;Production * Bengan Andersson – engineering * Sebastian Forslund – mixing * Thomas "PLEC" Johansson – mastering ;Notes * Recorded at Nordic Sound Lab Studios in Skara, Sweden. * Mastered at Panic Room Studios in Skara, Sweden. == References == Category:2015 albums Category:The Night Flight Orchestra albums
title: Skyline Whispers
